Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
05.02.2013 SH SCR17895 CreditLimit: Added update FM06_IFOWNSELLERNR / FM06_IFOWNBUYERNR
29.05.2012 JH SCR17269 Added update of new fields FCMH_ADMNO, FCMH_CLNTNO and FCMH_DEBH_NO
21.11.2011 SH SCR16915 Added test on CLNT203_OFFICE = WAW to skip writing differences in buyer details
11.11.2010 SH SCR15960 CreditLimit: Added test on FM05_MSGFUNCTION = 7 to set
FM06_MSGFUNCTION and FM06_RESPONSE
29.07.2010 SH SCR15685 Added module "SaveCreditPeriodDays" and extended update
of FM08_RESPONSE in module "Revision of Credit limit"
20.07.2010 GB SCR15668 Changed condition for update FM03_LONGCREDITPERIODDAY and
FM06_LONGCREDITPERIODDAYS, FM08_LONGCREDITPERIODDAYS
01.06.2010 AK SCR16565 longest period in days set to 60 instead of 90
28.05.2010 GB SCR15541 Replaced table CLTC by table LTCL
14.12.2009 SH SCR15163 Removed update "FM08_RESPONSE = 1 if CLHS_LIMITNEW =
CLHS_LIMITOLD" in step "Revision of Credit limit without message 7"
04.12.2009 SH SCR15129 Changed updates FM03/6/8_LONGCREDITPERIODDAYS
at all places where new FM03/06/08 rows are stored
20.10.2009 SH SCR14751 Extended update of FCMT_MESSAGE_TEXT with debtor
details if a new FCI message 8 is stored
05.10.2009 GB SCR14958 Removed update the v.Text (where v.Text is set to blank)
from the Difference in Buyer details
21.08.2009 SH SCR14751 Extended tests to store FCI_MESSAGE6/8 and changed test
to store FCI_MESSAGE 8 (without7)
21.07.2009 SH SCR14751 Added module to write differences in buyer/debtor
details to FCI_MESSAGE_TEXT
08.01.2009 SH SCR14288 Added storage of FCMH_CURRENCY
12.12.2008 SH SCR14226 Extended updates of FM06/FM08_RESPONSE to make sure that
fields at least updated with 1
04.12.2008 SH SCR14192 Part2 (MSG06) Changed update of FM08_RESPONSE
04.12.2008 SH SCR14194 Removed module "AddRequestToArchive"
03.12.2008 SH SCR14192 Part3 (FirstMSG08) Changed update of FM08_RESPONSE
28.11.2008 SH SCR14166 Chagned update of FM08_CURRENCY (4. module)
27.11.2008 SH SCR14160 Added module "AddRequestToArchive"
26.11.2008 SH SCR14152 Update FM08_ORIGREQNR = '0' in 4th part where FM08 is
stored, see task "RevisionCreditLimitWithoutMSG7"
21.11.2008 SH SCR14134 Diff. changes (e.g. added UPPER() tests to check for FCBU
seller / buyer numbers)
19.11.2008 SH SCR14060 Added module "RevisionCreditLimitWithoutMSG7"
.. if it's not a FCI limit request (MSG05) and not a FCI limit change
request (MSG07) store a MSG08 for a revision of credit limit
-- Update FM06_IFOWNSELLERNR
... check to reset FM06_IFOWNSELLERNR
Update FM06_IFOWNBUYERNR
-- Prepare contents for FCMT_MESSAGE_TEXT
... in case of new messages 3 and 6 and differenes in buyer details
write the details also in FCMT_MESSAGE_TEXT
... in case of new message 8 always write debtor details
... check if FCMT_MESSAGE_TEXT is empty
-- Write buyer and debtor details to FCI message in case of differences for new
FCI messages = 3 and 6
-- Extract city string from DEBH_HADR_CITY
-- Differences in buyer/debtor details
... write always a blank line
-- Write always debtor details in case of FCI message = 8
... write always a blank line

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('The limit decision issued by ING Commercial Finance is valid for official name and address mentioned below. Please verify.')
MlsTrans ('The limit decision issued by ING Commercial Finance is valid for official name and address mentioned below.')
